title: MD
biography: S. Rajakumar is an Indian politician. A member of the Indian National Congress, he represents the Mayiladuthurai constituency in the Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly.
aiSummary: S. Arulselvan is a drug development specialist with an H-index of 110 at Pharmacology (Faculty). Based in India.
